entry.title: Harry Jackson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Harry Jackson (pictured) received acclaim for his portrayal of Napoleon due to his physical resemblance?

entry.title: Campbell's Soup I (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that climate change protesters vandalized and glued themselves to a version of Andy Warhol's Campbell's Soup I?

entry.title: Paul Roach (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Paul Roach became so popular for coaching the Wyoming Cowboys football team that people voted for him to be the state's governor even though he was not a candidate?

entry.title: release a soundtrack album (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Angeline Quinto became the first Filipino singer to release a soundtrack album for a television series that featured a single artist?

entry.title: Pachypanthera (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the early big cat Pachypanthera may have weighed as much as 142 kilograms (313 lb) and had teeth similar to a hyena's?

entry.title: a former residence for people with tuberculosis (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in 2014, one could pay half a million US dollars to live in a former residence for people with tuberculosis?

entry.title: Jessica Berman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that when Jessica Berman was named the deputy commissioner of the National Lacrosse League, she became the first woman to hold that position in a men's professional sports league?

entry.title: Venetian Blinds (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Venetian Blinds uses Venetian blinds to simulate Venetian blinds?
